document.full_text: after scoring twice without a hit in the third inning, the yankees pounded out six runs in the fifth. c. c. sabathia did not allow an earned run in seven innings.
document.title: yankees 12, white sox 3: homers are just a part of the yanks' big night
lines_and_colors: after scoring twice without a hit in the third inning, the yankees pounded out six runs in the fifth. c. c. sabathia did not allow an earned run in seven innings.
